title: What are some of your favorite theme comps?
body:
Mine would be an ice composition, with lots of freljord, and glacial malphite and the like. the cc is so real with those. it's so beautiful.

I figured it would be kinda fun to spread some ideas around, and perhaps start some theme customs with some of the ideas.

speaking about theme custom, I'll be doing those for the next couple hours, so if you want in on those feel free to join.

replies.body: http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/df/Pentakill_Preview.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140528062942&path-prefix=de

I mean you can do theme comps that are also legitimately good.
Or for this matter, even legitimate.
{{champion:62}} isn't ionian, yi is ionian, and just happens to have taught him.
{{champion:202}} is neither confirmed nor denied as Ionian, simply that he was imprisoned by the ionians.
Example:
Ionia:
{{champion:39}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:16}} 
Demacia:
{{champion:86}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:37}} (yeah, lucian was born in demacia)
Freljord:
{{champion:2}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:201}} (subs: {{champion:23}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:79}} )
Techies (Zaun / Pilties):
{{champion:245}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:40}} 

Just to come up with a few.

{{champion:202}} is largely considered Ionian (plus I couldn't think of any other ADC who was remotely related to Ionia. I had no clue about {{champion:110}} since he's not really a champ I pay attention to :p)

As for {{champion:62}}, he's not from Ionia (at least until they rework his lore, considering they seem to be working the Plague Jungles out of the lore), but he takes up residence there now. A bit like how {{champion:16}} is a celestial being like {{champion:432}} and {{champion:136}}, but lives in Ionia. He resides in Ionia learning Wuju style from {{champion:11}}. Besides, there isn't a way to do a "Plague Jungle" comp, he's the only champ from there since {{champion:33}} got reworked into a Shuriman champ and either way, that would still only be 2 champs.
yeah but how are you gonna convince the warring queens to all work together for the freljord, when you havent made a void comp to face them
{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}- Draaaven

{{champion:30}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:120}}  - Shadow Isles comp
You got that nice mix of AD, AP, and tankiness, all with a ton of burst :))

Only thing is that {{champion:28}} isn't from the shadow isles.
Evelynn simply IS.
Should probably replace her with the {{champion:120}} if we want a legitimate shadow isles comp.
Ahh! Thank you for the correction

The Kalista-Blitzcrank-Thresh comp. Blitz hits the grab, takes thresh's lantern, Kalista ults thresh.

Suddenly, the victim is on the other side of the map.

Throw in a gragas/tristana/leesin for good measure

3, if you count dragon knight morde.
Nah... was mostly hoping to get 3 new yordle skins with dragon trainer line. Even came up with an idea to fill in for those.
I like the dnd roleplay skins but i really wish they would add more battlebunnys and stargaurdian skins
